question: Kamala Harris wins a solid red state?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Democratic candidate for president wins the popular vote in any solid red state(s) in the 2024 U.S. Presidential election. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Solid red states include: Alabama, Alaska, Arkansas, Idaho, Indiana, Iowa, Kansas, Kentucky, Louisiana, Mississippi, Missouri, Montana, Nebraska, North Dakota, Ohio, Oklahoma, South Carolina, South Dakota, Tennessee, Utah, West Virginia, Wyoming.

Solid red states are defined using the Cook Political Report's ratings as of this market's inception. Further changes to cook political report's rankings will not be considered for this market.

Individual congressional district electors will not count towards the resolution of this market; only statewide popular vote results will be considered.

A candidate shall be considered to represent a party in the event that he or she is the nominee, or has a ballot-listed or otherwise identifiable party preference, of the party in question.
This market may resolve immediately if at least one of the listed states has been called for the Democratic candidate for President by the Associated Press, Fox News, and NBC, or if all listed states have been called by the Associated Press, Fox News, and NBC.

The resolution source for this market is the Associated Press, Fox News, and NBC. If all three sources haven’t called the race in the listed states for the same candidate, this market will resolve based on the official certification.

question: Lakers vs. Nuggets Series Winner
description:
In the 2024 NBA playoff series between the Los Angles Lakers and Denver Nuggets:

If the Los Angles Lakers win the series, the market will resolve to “Lakers”.

If the Denver Nuggets win the series, the market will resolve to “Nuggets”.

events.title: Lakers vs. Nuggets Series Winner

question: NBA Play-In: Heat vs Bulls
description:
This market refers to the NBA Play-In game between the Miami Heat and Chicago Bulls scheduled for April 19, 2024, 7:00 PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Heat" if the Miami Heat win the game.

This market will resolve to "Bulls" if the Chicago Bulls win the game.

If the game is not completed by April 25, 2024 11:59 PM ET, the market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: NBA Play-In: Heat vs Bulls

question: 'Abigail' over $15m opening weekend?
description:
This is a market on how much 'Abigail' (2024) will gross domestically on its opening weekend. The “Domestic Weekend” tab on https://www.boxofficemojo.com/release/rl1488880385 will be used to resolve this market once the values for the 3-day opening weekend (April 19 - April 21) are final (i.e. not studio estimates).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if 'Abigail' (2024) grosses more than $15,000,000 on its 3-day opening weekend. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Please note, this market will resolve according to the Box Office Mojo numbers under Domestic Weekend for the 3-day weekend (which typically includes Thursday's previews), regardless of whether domestic refers to only the USA, or to USA and Canada, etc.

If there is no final data available by April 29, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, another credible resolution source will be chosen.

events.title: 'Abigail' over $15m opening weekend?

question: Knicks vs. 76ers Series Winner
description:
In the 2024 NBA playoff series between the New York Knicks and Philadelphia 76ers:

If the New York Knicks win the series, the market will resolve to “Knicks”.

If the Philadelphia 76ers win the series, the market will resolve to “76ers”.

events.title: Knicks vs. 76ers Series Winner

question: Drake track officially drops in April?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Drake officially releases a new song/track, as a lead artist, between April 17, 2024 and April 30, 2024, 11:59 PM PT. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be such a release on any major streaming platform.

events.title: Drake track officially drops in April?

question: Knicks vs. 76ers
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for April 20:

If the New York Knicks win, the market will resolve to "Knicks”.

If the Philadelphia 76ers win, the market will resolve to “76ers”.

If the game is not completed by April 26, 2024 11:59 PM ET, the market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: NBA

question: Will the NDA win less than 300 seats?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the NDA controls less than 300 seats in the Lok Sabha as a result of the 2024 Indian general election. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If voting in the 2024 Indian General Election does not occur by December 31, 2024, this market will resolve to "Yes".

This market will resolve based off the party composition of the NDA at the time of the official announcement of the election results, currently scheduled for June 4. Any subsequent changes to the NDA coalition will not be considered for this market's resolution.

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: Indian Election: How many seats will the NDA win?

question: Top 10 songs on Billboard all from Taylor Swift?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if all numbers 1-10 on Billboard's Hot 100 are held by Taylor Swift for the first week her new album "The Tortured Poets Department" is released. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The "first week" is defined as the first Billboard week that takes into account songs from Taylor swift's new album.

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from Billboard (https://www.billboard.com/charts/hot-100/).

events.title: Top 10 songs on Billboard all from Taylor Swift?

question: Top 5 songs on Billboard all from Taylor Swift?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if all numbers 1-5 on Billboard's Hot 100 are held by Taylor Swift for the first week her new album "The Tortured Poets Department" is released. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The "first week" is defined as the first Billboard week that takes into account songs from Taylor swift's new album.

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from Billboard (https://www.billboard.com/charts/hot-100/).

events.title: Top 5 songs on Billboard all from Taylor Swift?

question: Taylor Swift #1 album for 1 week?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Taylor Swift's "The Tortured Poets Society" album is in the number 1 position on the Billboard 200 chart for exactly the 1 week following its drop. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The first week following the album drop is defined as the first Billboard week that takes into account Taylor Swift's "The Tortured Poets Society" album.

This market will immediately resolve to “No” if the album has been #1 for more than 1 consecutive weeks following its drop.

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from Billboard (https://www.billboard.com/charts/billboard-200/).

events.title: Taylor Swift #1 album for how many weeks in a row?

question: Taylor Swift #1 album for 2 weeks?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Taylor Swift's "The Tortured Poets Society" album is in the number 1 position on the Billboard 200 chart for exactly the 2 consecutive weeks following its drop. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The first week following the album drop is defined as the first Billboard week that takes into account Taylor Swift's "The Tortured Poets Society" album.

This market will immediately resolve to “No” if the album has been #1 for more than 2 consecutive weeks following its drop.

Additionally this market will immediately resolve to “No” if the album dropped off #1 before reaching 2 consecutive weeks at #1 following its drop.

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from Billboard (https://www.billboard.com/charts/billboard-200/).

events.title: Taylor Swift #1 album for how many weeks in a row?

question: Taylor Swift #1 album for 0 weeks?
description:

The first week following the album drop is defined as the first Billboard week that takes into account Taylor Swift's "The Tortured Poets Society" album.

This market will immediately resolve to “No” if the album is #1 at least one week following its drop.

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from Billboard (https://www.billboard.com/charts/billboard-200/).

events.title: Taylor Swift #1 album for how many weeks in a row?

description:
This is a market on how much 'The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare' (2024) will gross domestically on its opening weekend. The “Domestic Weekend” tab on https://www.boxofficemojo.com/title/tt5177120 will be used to resolve this market once the values for the 3-day opening weekend (April 19 - April 21) are final (i.e. not studio estimates).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if 'The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare' (2024) grosses more than $8,000,000 on its 3-day opening weekend. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Please note, this market will resolve according to the Box Office Mojo numbers under Domestic Weekend for the 3-day weekend (which typically includes Thursday's previews), regardless of whether domestic refers to only the USA, or to USA and Canada, etc.

If there is no final data available by April 29, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, another credible resolution source will be chosen.

events.title: 'The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare' over $8m opening weekend?

question: Will Ansem mention $WIF in post fight interview?
description:
This is a market on whether Ansem (@blknoiz06) will say "WIF", "dogwifhat", or "dog with hat" during his post-fight interview, scheduled for April 19, 2024, in Dubai, following his fight against Barney (@barneytheboi). 

This market will resolve to “Yes” if Ansem says either "WIF", "dogwifhat", or "dog with hat" during his post-fight interview. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No".  

Note - if he makes references to dogwifhat but does not explicitly say "WIF", "dogwifhat", or "dog with hat", this market will resolve to "No." Capitalization does not matter for this market.

Note: if Ansem does multiple post-fight interviews, this market will consider all of them.

If Ansem's fight appearance is canceled or delayed past April 26 this market will resolve "No". If there is no live stream of the post-fight interview, or an interview does not take place, this market will resolve to “No”.

The primary source for this market will be official audio and video stream of Ansem’s post-fight interview available here: (https://www.trillertv.com/watch/cfn-4/2pevx/). If the trillertv stream is unavailable, other video streams may be used to resolve this market.

events.title: Will Ansem mention $WIF in post fight interview?

question: Ansem vs. Barney: Will either fighter be hospitalized?
description:
This market refers to the boxing match between Ansem (@blknoiz06) and Barney (@barneytheboi), scheduled for April 19, 2024, in Dubai.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if either Ansem or Barney is taken to the hospital immediately following the fight. The hospitalization must be directly related to injuries or medical issues stemming from the fight.

If the fight is canceled or delayed past April 26, 2024 this market will resolve to “No”. If there is no reliable information available about the fighters' medical status after the fight, this market will resolve to "No."

The resolution source for this market is a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: Ansem vs. Barney: Will either fighter be hospitalized?

question: Ansem vs. Barney go the distance?
description:
This market refers to the boxing match between Ansem (@blknoiz06) and Barney (@barneytheboi), scheduled for April 19, 2024, in Dubai.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if the fight lasts for all the scheduled rounds without any stoppage due to a knockout, technical knockout, disqualification, or any other reason that would prevent the match from completing all rounds. Any stoppage which prevents the completion of the fight will cause this market to resolve to "No".

If the fight is canceled or delayed past April 26, 2024 this market will resolve to “No”. 

The resolution source for this market is a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: Ansem vs. Barney go the distance?
